entry.title: Pocket home lab | Setting up remote access to your home lab
entry.summary: Remote access is a crucial aspect to consider when you setup your own infrastructure. You could have it sitting on the “edge” and be able to directly talk to it or use a secure VPN to have controlled access. Here, I have written about my experience with for setting remote access to my home lab with ZeroTier and possible alternatives ways one can approach the same scenario.

entry.title: "/proc" file system | Enumerating for a foothold
entry.summary: The /proc filesystem is a unique location in a Linux system which holds runtime information of the system. Let’s look at why does it exist and how can a malicious actor can leverage it for enumeration.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: Hello world! Welcome to my little corner of the inter-webs.
